mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.techinal_bulletin_id , t1.bulletin_no , t1.track_date , t1.people , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_es_report_track t1
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.TECHINAL_BULLETIN_ID like '%'||#{bean.techinalBulletinId}||'%'
and t1.BULLETIN_NO like '%'||#{bean.bulletinNo}||'%'
and t1.TRACK_DATE >= #{bean.trackDateBegin}
and t1.TRACK_DATE <= #{bean.trackDateEnd}
and t1.PEOPLE like '%'||#{bean.people}||'%'
and t1.REMARK like '%'||#{bean.remark}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like '%'||#{bean.attribute11}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like '%'||#{bean.attribute12}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like '%'||#{bean.attribute13}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like '%'||#{bean.attribute14}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.techinal_bulletin_id , t1.bulletin_no , t1.track_date , t1.people , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_es_report_track t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into hdkf_es_report_track
id,
techinal_bulletin_id,
bulletin_no,
track_date,
people,
remark,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
attribute_11,
attribute_12,
attribute_13,
attribute_14,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{techinalBulletinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bulletinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{trackDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update hdkf_es_report_track t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.techinal_bulletin_id =#{techinalBulletinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.bulletin_no =#{bulletinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.track_date =#{trackDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.people =#{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_11 =#{attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_12 =#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

update hdkf_es_report_track t1 set t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.techinal_bulletin_id =#{techinalBulletinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.bulletin_no =#{bulletinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.track_date =#{trackDate,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.people =#{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_date =#{creationDate}, t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version =t1.version+1, t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_11 =#{attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.attribute_12 =#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE}, where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}
